# Complete File Listing

## Generated by Implementation

### Configuration & Documentation
- `.gitignore` - Git ignore rules (output/, logs)
- `README.md` - Comprehensive user documentation (400+ lines)
- `QUICKSTART.md` - Quick reference guide
- `IMPLEMENTATION.md` - Technical implementation details
- `FILES.md` - This file
- `test-config.js` - Example .surfingkeysrc with types

### Docker Setup
- `docker/Dockerfile` - Container definition for type generation
  - Base: node:22-alpine
  - Clones Surfingkeys
  - Installs dependencies
  - Generates TypeScript declarations

### Scripts
- `scripts/generate.sh` - Main generation script
  - Option parsing (--output, --version, --repo, --clean, --help)
  - Docker build and run
  - Post-processing (combine .d.ts files)
  - Package.json creation
  - Colored output with error handling

### CI/CD
- `workflows/generate-types.yml` - GitHub Actions workflow
  - Triggers: push, tags, manual, weekly
  - Docker layer caching
  - Artifact upload
  - GitHub releases

### Generated Output (gitignored)
- `output/surfingkeys.d.ts` - Combined TypeScript definitions (376 lines)
- `output/package.json` - Package metadata

## Usage

### Generate Types
```bash
cd scripts
./generate.sh
```

### Use in Config
```javascript
/// <reference path="./surfingkeys-types/output/surfingkeys.d.ts" />
```

### Copy to Another Project
```bash
cp -r surfingkeys-types /path/to/project/
```

## File Statistics
- Total files created: 10
- Documentation lines: ~1500+
- Generated types: 376 lines
- Shell script: ~200 lines
- Dockerfile: ~60 lines
- GitHub Actions: ~120 lines
